Specific Details: Support the Climate Emergency Measures Bill 2017 - this bill seeks to prohibit the issuing of licenes for the exploration and extraction of petroleum, natural gas and coal. A ban on offshore drilling is the next logical step to a better energy future for all Irish citizens.

Subject Matter: Support the Climate Emergency Measures Bill 2017 - this bill seeks to prohibit the issuing of licenes for the exploration and extraction of petroleum, natural gas and coal. A ban on offshore drilling is the next logical step to a better energy future for all Irish citizens.
Intended Results: Reduce Ireland's emmissions by leaving fossil fuels in the ground

Specific Details: Awareness raising of the unique benefits of childminding and lobbying for the inclusion of childminding in a system of supports
DPOs Lobbied: Bernie McNally|Assistant Secretary|Department of Children and Youth Affairs::Katherine Zappone|Minister|Department of Children and Youth Affairs::Kathleen Funchion|TD|Dáil Éireann, the Oireachtas::Denise Mitchell|TD|Dáil Éireann, the Oireachtas::Andrew Doyle|Minister of State|Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine
Subject Matter: Awareness raising of the unique benefits of childminding and lobbying for the inclusion of childminding in a system of supports
Intended Results: Raising awareness of the benefits of childminding for children and families, and to the fact that there is no regulatory system for the majority of childminders.  Families choosing to use childminding services for their childcare needs are largely excluded from state subsidies.   Lobbying for those childminders who are effectively excluded from all state supports.

Specific Details: The Childcare (Amendment) Act 2015, and the  National Aftercare Policy and Guidance

Subject Matter: The Childcare (Amendment) Act 2015, and the  National Aftercare Policy and Guidance
